alert.note: Alert for Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides, northern Evangeline, northeastern Beauregard, Avoyelles, Vernon and northeastern Allen Parishes, northern Newton and northeastern Jasper Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Plaucheville to 7 miles northeast of Pitkin to near Harrisburg. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, De Ridder, Jasper, Leesville, Marksville, Bunkie, Newton, Simmesport, Rosepine, Glenmora, Boyce, Moreauville, Anacoco, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Toledo Bend Dam, Hineston and Lena. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 47 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
